node.text: Why did he do that? That small old man knocked me down with a beer bottle and now I stink of alcohol.
I'm sure he went to that bar to drink another one, better go and talk to him. I need to know where I ended up.
Heeyyy Boy!!
Are.... Are you talking to me?
Of course, you see anyone else around here besides the giant green monster? He doesn't talk too much.

dialogue.option: 1: Sorry, I'm out, I can't deal with this, I'll get going.
2: What do you want, I don't have money on me right now.

node.text: Wait don't run away from me. There's, there's lava all over the place.
Wait when did all this lava spread? It was you right? It has to be you, I'll never forgive you NEVER (dies dramatically).
That was unexpected, I better go inside and see if the old man is there.
No, I don't want your money, I'm here to tell you a secret, I buried the biggest treasure in this asteroid but I don't remember where I left it.
So you want me to help you look for it? I'm not a charity volunteer, you know.
What? No, nonono, it's my treasure, only mine, it helps with the voices, do you understand? No one will ever find my treasure, it's mine!!
Hey, hey I found it! Oh well, one last trip won't hurt me.
All right, nice, he just... never mind, we're not seeing him again.
Hey Boy, do you have a second?

dialogue.option: 2: Sure, what's up friendly looking stranger?

node.text: Not really, listen I have a job for you.
Well well, look who's trying to be funny.
You see, a long time ago i started taking cooking very seriously, it all began that one day when...
Can't we just skip this and get to the job you were mentioning earlier?
Yeah, long old stories are always boring. I get it, you want to go straight to the point, perfect.
What would you tell me if I said i'll pay you 10 bronze coins for every drunk, annoying customer you take out of my classy bar?
Excellent, you can begin as soon as you like, I always have people that would be better outside. You're old enough right.
Of course I'm old enough, you're the one making me fight big drunk people here.
Good point.
Only 10 coins with the possibility of drinking the best ron in the galaxy, deal?
Whenever you're ready to work, talk with me, I'll tell you who to take out.
I better go find that old man, he may leave without me if I don't do so and I would be doomed by then.
What, what do you want? I think i told your friends earlier that i'm not interested in knowing the truth behind the creation of the universe.
Now get away or suffer my legendary wrath!
Look who woke up after a free trip here, hahahaha you deadhead.
It was you crashing into me in the middle of nowhere in the first place you crazy old man. How do you expect me to return to my fancy ship?
What about my comrades? I was about to live great adventures until you and your stupid, old, rusty ship appeared.
Look, you deadhead, you were the one floating in the middle and my ship's assisted direction broke yesterday, that's why i'm here.
Only because my ship's broken you hear me? Another one and make it strong enough to make me forget, Barman.
Get away you deadhead I have nothing to do with you.
I told you i have a name, I'm Ray.
Little bastard, took you long enough to get here, What a little nap you took eh? Come here sit down and drink with us.
Let's listen to my friend here, he says he's a pirate legend himself, we could be rich in no time. Hey where's the drink I ordered!
Long, long time ago, I was one a legendary captain, everyone feared me and my 500 man army, we were unstoppable. Until...
Our most veteran pilot drove the ship too close to a black hole, he took the only life-saving shuttle, leaving the ship and his comrades behind.
How many times do I have to tell you, the ship's assisted direction wasn't working as it should.
Lucky for me that day I had an important meeting to attend so I wasn't flying.
When I found out about my ship I swore that I'd never have another tripulation.
I buried all my gear in different planets for some reason, only for them to be found by the bravest pirates.
But that ends today, I need you to recover my treasures, I'll give you more details when you're ready, we will be feared again!
I knew I shouldn't have gotten out of my bed todayâ€¦
You can't be serious, you know how much power you'd get on yourself if we recovered his treasures? Imagine all the ladies you'll have on your feet.
You mean they won't spit on me again? I could even maintain a conversation without being insulted?
You have to be kidding me, that's just sad.
Count me in partner, I will establish your galaxy wide legend.
(To himself) Screw these old folks, I can't wait to be that popular and awfully rich.
Hey have you heard, the kid's saying he will do it!
Okay, come back after I finish my drinks so I can give you the map for the first item.
I better go find that old man, he may leave without me if I don't do so and I would be doomed by then.
So, ready for the job Ray?

dialogue.option: 1: No, i still have to do something else.

node.text: Well okay, remember about our the deal.
Nicely said, take these super awesome weapons, it's your turn to fight.
Should I even touch it?
